document.full_text: nasdaq omx group  and intercontinentalexchange inc  appealed directly to nyse euronext  stockholders on tuesday, asking them to press the big board's directors to sit down to talk about their joint bid.
document.title: nasdaq, ice urge nyse shareholders to back talks
lines_and_colors: nasdaq omx group  and intercontinentalexchange inc  appealed directly to nyse euronext  stockholders on tuesday, asking them to press the big board's directors to sit down to talk about their joint bid.
